newsitem.title: ALBANIA: Ungrateful beggar brings old Albanian proverb to life.
newsitem.headline: Ungrateful beggar brings old Albanian proverb to life.

text.p: An Albanian man faces trial for attacking a beggar who stoned his house after spurning the food he was given, a newspaper said on Wednesday.
Hasan Hasani, an ethnic Albanian Yugoslav, was eating with his family when a man knocked on his door begging for food, Gazeta Shqiptare daily reported.
Taking pity, Hasani gave the beggar half a loaf of bread and some sausage. But the beggar returned moments later and started hurling stones at Hasani's house.

Hasani seized a bread knife and attacked the beggar, apparently in defence. He will appear in court in a case that exactly fits an old Albanian proverb: "I give you bread and you repay me with stones."
